mapper.select: select * from grouptravel.gt_product where productName like "%"#{name}"%"
mapper.insert: insert into grouptravel.gt_product (productId, productName, cityId, price, description, maxNum, maxDiscount, productTime, transportationId, themeId) values (default ,#{productName},#{cityId},#{price},#{description},#{maxNum},#{maxDiscount},#{productTime},#{transportationId},#{themeId})
mapper.select: select productId from (select count(*) number,productId from grouptravel.gt_order where payTime > #{date_1} AND payTime < #{date_2} group by productId order by number desc limit 3 ) a
select themeName from grouptravel.gt_producttheme where themeId=#{id};
select transportationName from grouptravel.gt_transportation where transportationId=#{id}
select cityName from grouptravel.gt_city where cityId=#{id}
select * from gt_product ORDER BY maxDiscount DESC LIMIT 3
select IFNULL(AVG(rate),0) FROM gt_notes where productId=#{productId}
